comments: Ok I don't even care anymore. This is honestly a great game. But tone it down with the forced ads a bit. And the tranquilizer darts are too annoying. Nerf them please. And also, I think you should add at least these things. 1. Add a drill weapon for the normal vehicle. (Not the ultimate ones.) 2. Make it so you get 3 - 20 free gems every day. (I will love you if you do this.) last one. Add mythic and secret rarity parts. Mythic chances: 0.01383% Secret chances: 0.0000112% (add mythic boxes too.)

I am a prestige 60 player. Played this game over a year to achieve that. Watch all the ads everyday. I am a gang leader as well. But since the day they introduce the purple darts, which makes players with them almost invincible. This whole game becomes a very uneven playing ground. Of the developer is not going to make playing this game fair. I will petition to get a lot of players to forever quit playing this game. Very dissapointed that I wasted one over years on you.

Played this game for 1 and a half years. By the time they introduced the tranquilizer darts, the game becomes medium to EXTREMELY HARD. LITERALLY IMPOSSIBLE TO DEFEAT ANYONE WITH IT. AND HOW CAN ALMOST EVERYONE IN THE WORLD HAS IT!? CAN'T ADVANCE TO PRESTIGE 5 WITHOUT PLAYING THIS GAME FOR MONTHS!! very disappointed in you, C. A. T. S. At least nerf the gun. Reduce the stun time from five seconds to two, maybe. Help me out here because THIS IS THE EIGHTH WEEK OF TRYING TO ADVANCE TO STAGE 23.

I'm hooked, my son is hooked, my daughter is hooked. Genuinely the best mobile game I've played. The adds were a bit intrusive in the beginning, but it is a free game after all and the gameplay kept me coming back regardless. After a few days I payed to remove them. Lets face it, the developers deserve support for such an excellent game. **Edit 27/10/20: they've added a couple of items (tranquiliser gun I'm looking at you!) that have horribly unbalanced the game, ruining the fun completely.

I've played this game for like 2 or more years. Darts destroyed the gameplay even though I've got two from the grand prix. It just narrows down the game and downgrades it to less creative levels. Also, I think that I'm closest ever to deleting the game from my device at this point.

The NERF battle is ON!
Can you Tag everyone without being Caught?

title: Real Boxing ‚Äì¬†Fighting Game
description:
Real Boxing is a very popular fighting game & boxing simulator on Google Play, with jaw-dropping graphics, a full-blown career for your boxer and intuitive controls. Get your boxing gloves on and box like there‚Äôs no tomorrow!

The champion of the fighting games is here:

--- 
TOUCH ARCADE ‚Äì "It‚Äôs called Real Boxing for a very good reason, and it lives up to its name impeccably well." 4.5/5 
IGN ‚Äì ‚ÄúReal Boxing is an Unreal Engine-powered beauty.‚Äú
148 APPS ‚Äì "Real Boxing offers a console quality boxing app experience." 4.5/5 
---

Time to box & KO others in this boxing app! Vivid Games, the studio behind well known online fighting games on mobile, puts on the boxing gloves and presents the original KO boxing simulator that won the hearts of punching games fans worldwide! Enter the ring and let‚Äôs box!

KNOCKOUT GAMEPLAY IN THE ULTIMATE FIGHTING GAME
Fight using a variety of punches and combos in a knockout boxing app game. Box to up your fight game and tip the odds in favor of your boxer with power-ups. Feel every jab, hook and KO uppercut thanks to the most intuitive controls in multiplayer fighting games on mobile. They may be coming from kung fu or UFC roots, but you‚Äôve got the boxing gloves: whatever other opponents‚Äô fight games are, you‚Äôll always box like a boxeo boss, like Rocky.

COMPREHENSIVE CAREER IN THE TRUE BOXING SIMULATOR
This fight game is a challenge: knock out over 30 unique boxers with their own adaptive boxing styles in a full-blown career mode to become a true boxeo champion, the best boxer in the world! Welcome to the true fighting game on Android.

YOUR REAL BOXER, READY TO BOX
The fight night is coming, so get ready: customize your own boxer with dozens of unlockable hairstyles, tattoos, and gear. Train in a variety of boxeo mini-games as your fight game gets better and better. In this fighting game you‚Äôll face off against challengers as tough as Rocky Balboa!

BEFORE YOU KNOCKOUT: TRAIN & BOX IN A VARIETY OF MINI-GAMES
Put on your boxing gloves and get to the gym: boost your speed, strength and stamina enrolling in the training mode consisting of fun punching games (speed bag, heavy bag) and jumping a skipping rope.

EXHILARATING BONUS MODES
Put your boxing to the test and fight boxeo bosses in Real Boxing‚Äôs Arcade Mode, or take on the Underground Tournament to unlock brand new gear for your boxer!

AMAZING GRAPHICS & SOUND
As you box, immerse yourself in adrenaline pumping world of Unreal Engine-powered graphics and realistic motion-captured animations.

ENGAGING FEATURES
Win amazing boxeo prizes with Daily Rewards the Daily Spin. Also, how is your fight game? Check before the big fight night begins!

OVER 50 MILLION PUNCHING PLAYERS AROUND THE GLOBE!

Check more Vivid Games‚Äô online fighting games:
Real Boxing 2, the sequel, with more advanced graphics and combat mechanics.

Real Boxing is a trademark of Vivid Games. Unreal Engine is a product of Epic Games and is licensed. UFC is a registered trademark of UFC and is not affiliated nor featured in the game.

title: Light-It Up
description:
Warning: this game WILL hook you - jumping games have never been so awesomely addictive. 
It‚Äôs a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and it‚Äôs about time you light-it up and make the colors glow. 

Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up. 

Collect stars as you swing, jump and flip to raise your score, in the funnest of all jumping games. 

Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss and are loving that color glow, things get complicated (or ‚Äústicky,‚Äù if you will) as you jump, flip and pass levels. Color shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.

If you miss a jump, if your swing‚Äôs a dud, if your flip isn‚Äôt on point, or if you hit a spike‚Ä¶ you fall into oblivion!

So what do you say, stickman? Ready to swing, jump, flip, light-it up and glow, in the brightest of all jumping games?

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

comments: It's decent. Good balance between being too difficult amd not difficult enough. The major problem is that once you hit lvl 50 the ads get to the point where you could probably sue for harassment. Lol, jk. Before lvl 50 there are ads bout every 3 or 4 tries. Reasonable. But after 50 its an ad after every single attempt which has led me to delete it.

Really cool concept, easy to learn, and relaxing even on difficult levels, however, I'm not giving 5 stars for 2 reasons, and I really hope the developers listen to me on this. TOO many ads, I have to turn off my internet because I can't even skip the "Retry?" screen, and there is an ad literally after every death. I understand that there's a profit to be made, and there's VIP, but tone it down a little, it crashes the experience. The other one is a suggestion: An endless mode, think about it

Very fun and addictive. Very pleasing visuals. The ads on the free are not too frequent. A fair and good balance of them. There is no one off as free option and the weekly fee is a little excessive. Would be 5 star if there was an option to remove ads for a one off fee and they can keep the weekly for the other parts of they want.

is literally this is literally the fun ever and plus when you pick new skins are the superheroes and when I play I pretend to be a superhero because I get to jump and go on top of the ships that light up and it is so fun this is like the funnest game I've ever done thank you so much for making this game one point about the ads it's really great at but sometimes every time I'm done with around it is starts an atom you're actually like 20 or five a bunch of seconds and I'm kind of annoyed.

The gameplay is simple but enjoyable but the adds are unbearable. Full screen video adds between each short level with sound that interrupts Bluetooth streamed audio. The juice just isn't worth the squeeze.

title: Tic Tac Toe Glow
description:
Play Tic Tac Toe on your Android phone. No need waste paper to play puzzle games! Now you can play Tic Tac Toe on your Android device for free. Our new modern version appears in a cool glow design. 

The AI for this puzzle game is one of the best you will see. It adapts to your play style and is highly unpredictable. Unlike other Tic Tac Toe games on the market you will always find Glow Tic Tac Toe AI to be fresh and entertaining. If that is not all the AI skill can be adjusted on the fly in game. So you can crank up the difficulty while playing or notch it down if you got cornered.This puzzles games is recommended for kids & adults too.  

Features :
-- Single and 2 player mode (Computer and human)
-- 3 difficulty levels
-- glow effects
-- one of the best puzzle game in the world.

title: AT&T Call Protect
description:
Activate the Call Protect app to enable Spam Risk and Unknown Caller blocking and more at no extra charge. Eligible AT&T subscribers are already protected with automatic Fraud call blocking and nuisance call warnings, using the power of the AT&T network. Call Protect subscribers also receive access to AT&T Mobile Security which help protect your phone from malware, viruses and other mobile threats. Req‚Äôs download of separate apps.  

Avail. for AT&T postpaid, FirstNet and business wireless customers with eligible wireless service.  

AT&T Call Protect: 
- Automatic Fraud Blocking: Detects and blocks calls from likely fraudsters, before your phone even rings 
- Block Spam Risk labelled calls: Enable in-app to block or send to voicemail calls identified as Spam Risk 
- Unknown Callers sent to voicemail: Enable in-app to send callers not in your contact list to voicemail. 
- Get a heads up on potential nuisance calls*: See warnings of telemarketers, nonprofit, surveys, account services, private or political callers 
- Personal Block List: Add individual unwanted callers to your own block list 
- Report Spam Calls: Help identify suspected spam and likely fraud calls. Your reports help us to continually improve our service for everyone  

AT&T Call Protect Plus (In-app purchase): 
- Caller ID*: Gives you caller details 
- Custom Call Controls: Take more control by blocking, sending to voicemail or allowing entire Categories (Telemarketer, Account Services, etc.) of callers 
- Reverse Number Lookup: Shows caller details when you enter a U.S. number. Up to 200 queries per user within 24-hour period. 
*Available in AT&T HD Voice coverage areas  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Terms: 
Automatic Fraud and Spam Risk Blocking: May inadvertently block wanted calls. Nuisance Call warnings: May include service messages and/or other permitted calls. Personal Block List: Permits blocking of individual phone numbers (excludes private numbers). Manage all settings via app.  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Plus Terms: 
$3.99/mo. Service auto-renews every 30 days unless canceled. Manage mobile purchases at att.com/mobilepurchases or call 800.331.0500 (611 from wireless phone). All Google Play billed subscriptions must be cancelled within Google Play. Deleting the app will not cancel the subscription. Custom Call Controls: All call categories, except Fraud, are automatically set to allow. Manage all settings via app. Payments are nonrefundable (subj. to applicable law).  

Rates: Data charges may apply for app download and usage. Other charges and restr. may apply. Eligibility: Compatible device req‚Äôd and includes AT&T HD Voice-enabled Android smartphones. Smartphones sold by other carriers may not be eligible. Excludes AT&T PREPAID.  

For complete terms for AT&T Call Protect, see att.com/callprotectterms 
For complete terms for AT&T Mobile Security, see att.com/mobilesecurityeula

comments: Mobile check deposit feature seems to have a bug, where it doesn't read the camera's orientation correctly after the first picture taken. It looks like the image is getting rotated again, so it's really squashed and not at the correct aspect ratio. You have to take the other picture manually, as the automatic feature doesn't really work when it gets into this state.

I was loving this app for depositing check, since my company doesn't have direct deposit. But lately, after I take the photo of one side of the check, I can't get a photo of the other side, because the app wants to take the photo in a long skinny "letterbox" format. It's quicker to get in the car and drive to an ATM than it is to get this to work. It makes the app useless to me.

This app just sucks. Rarely do I get the notifications that I set up in the app for alerts and if I do get them it's not until several hours later. Sometimes the app will open itself back up after I've already checked it and closed it out. Very frustrating to use. I've had several other banking apps and none have given me the problems BoA does. May be time for a new bank but until then my review of this app stays the same.

This App is wonderful and allows me to have a full banking experience. It even includes a chat feature which guides you through different topics of questions or concerns you have. It's very convenient that you can request a call from Customer service in the App so that you have zero wait time on hold and you generally receive a call within 5 minutes Max.

Terrible check capture. Clearly now a bug where you can only capture one side of a check. All subsequent attempts shows a skewed camera view and nonsensical pop-ups that renders it impossible. Only solution is to close and reopen the app, but you still can't capture both sides. Great timing when people don't want to visit branches in person. No QC at all during the pandemic?

title: Star Wars‚Ñ¢: Galaxy of Heroes
description:
Live your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your battle squad strategy using characters from every era, including champions from Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Rise of Skywalker, Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Last Jedi‚Ñ¢, and Rogue One‚Ñ¢: A Star Wars‚Ñ¢ Story. Engage in turn-based RPG battles, master the Squad Arena, wield Luke Skywalker‚Äôs lightsaber, join a Guild with friends, and take your strategy to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Imperial stalwarts? You‚Äôre free to choose as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other champion RPG characters from the Star Wars‚Ñ¢ universe. Develop your strategy and make key moves in this epic RPG battle arena. Pick teammates with complementary abilities and go to war with an unbeatable squad!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames based in a far-off cantina. Improve your RPG combat strategy by upgrading your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ heroes‚Äô abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to conquer the galaxy.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ heroes with cool gear to enhance their damage and improve your RPG strategy. Unlock fun abilities to make your champion team unstoppable as you unleash your lightsaber in Luke Skywalker‚Äôs Destined Strike, destroy enemies with Darth Vader‚Äôs Force Crush, and outsmart your opponents with Young Han Solo‚Äôs Trick Shot.

ENGAGE IN EPIC STARSHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic Star Wars‚Ñ¢ starships, including the Millennium Falcon, and massive Capital Ships, like Admiral Ackbar‚Äôs Home One, to construct your champion war fleets. Keep your cool in fast-paced RPG-style space combat, deploy reinforcements, and turn the tide of battle with the right strategy. Face fun new challenges and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for starship battles. Each starship has its own squad and strategy, adding special skills to individual starships. Recruit powerful pilots to create the strongest armada in the galaxy!

RISE TO THE TOP IN A GUILD
Grab your lightsaber and enter the Raid arena with friends. Fight against bosses like the Rancor, AAT Tank, and the Sith Triumvirate when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate to form a strategy with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire squad of champion characters and starships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance in this RPG when you face off in strategy-based battles against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global Guild leaderboards in Territory Wars.


Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges:
Hey, Galaxy of Heroes fans! We‚Äôve made a few game tweaks to enhance your experience in battle and beyond.

Have fun and thanks for joining the fight!
comments: This game is insanely good!! I have an underaged account, which is very annoying because it blocks some features, but it is still the BEST game I have ever played!! The graphics are very good and the gameplay is even better! All these people that say that it is PTP (Pay To Play) are WRONG!! I am at the max level and am very good, I have never payed anything! Hope anybody who plays this game enjoys it! Thank you very much EA for making such an amazing game!

I love this game. I don't spend and still enjoy it, although it is a grind, so don't expect any quick progression without spending. My one suggestion would be to have a randomized pull in the beginning that gives you a random but guaranteed character. Doesn't have to be anyone amazing. 1 or 2 star character that then makes your experience of the game unique. I know you can try and pull from a chromium card but no guarantees and gems are too valuable as f2p.

The game goes out of its way to ensure you're not making any decent progress without spending huge amounts. In the first 3 1/2 years of the game, new content and characters were frequent, though in the past year or so this has seen a rapid decline. Game modes have grown stale and repetitive. Any new characters have ridiculous requirements to obtain them, we are talking 6 month to a year to unlock. The game lacks balance, leveling up/gearing characters is an endless grind with little reward.

Collect Star wars characters, what more can I say. Have had the game over 2 years now and don't see myself leaving anytime soon. The game has its ups and downs, and of course there is a pay to win element, but it's in no way essential. Metas change fairly regularly and all eras of star wars are given their fair share of attention. The game also offers a great variety of game modes: Single player PVE, guild based PVE, single player PVP and guild based PVP. A fan of star wars must have this game.

STAR WARS: GALAXY OF RIP OFFS. Just ok. Starts out fun, but then the game becomes total pay for play. The prices they ask are ridiculous. Supply drops r a joke since 99% of what you get, is fairly useless. No really special stuff gets dropped and updating characters & ships, unless you're willing to drop serious coin - isn't happening. The new characters are impossible to get without $. Don't bother trying to contact the developers - you'll never get an answer.

comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 secondsü•∂üò¨üò¨ Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

So much design,options, color choices, and fantastic frames. This app definitely keeps me up all night! And, you don't need to be an artist or color professional. Designs and makeup applications you choose and can be proud of. The shades and lighting blend so easily. And with a plethora of filters and effects you are sure to be pleased and proud everytime. And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: Credit Karma - Free Credit Scores & Reports

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Credit Karma!

Our app is regularly updated to make it easier for you to track your financial progress. This version includes a number of performance improvements and squashes a few small pesky bugs.
comments: I like the new layout and look. However, I would give 5 stars if I didn't have to search for what comes through on the alert notifications. Example, "there's a special loan offer", where?! I have search for it, when the app should go right to the information that is on alert notification, and not just the home page. Many alerts I just ignore, because I become frustrated trying to find them. Just open directly to them once pressed, otherwise I'm just wasting time seeing the same information.

I really love this app and the website. It's convenient and easy to use. My only complaint right now it that no matter how many times I click on "Recommendations" and scroll through it, it ALWAYS says there is 1 waiting. It's been going on for a while and it's on both desktop and mobile, so I know it's not just this latest update to the app. I don't like the advertising of the credit cards all the time but I get it, to keep the app free you need to have ads, no problem. Recommend me stuff all the time, I don't care, just register that I've seen it once I have.

Great app, I mean ausome app, in less than a year, this app has helped me get all three of my credit scores boosted. They were all between 510-530 and now, only a year later all three range from 622-643. So this app has done wonders. After a year of doing what the app said I went from having no credit to having 3 credit cards and owning a house. SO CREDIT KARMA GETS A 10 STAR RATING FROM ME. I USED TO SPEND MONEY AS FAST AS IT HIT MY POCKET NOW I HAVE OVER 10,000 IN SAVINGS AND I'M A PACK RAT.

Good app, but this latest update sucks. I don't like the new UI, and it feels slower now. And one thing that's been bugging me forever, when you open the app and it displays where you enter your pin, raise all the numbers up. It's way too low. But the in app UI sucks now. Change it back please. It was easier on the eyes before and easier to read

I've been monitoring my credit for a couple years now with Credit Karma, but this is thee worst update they've done! Not to mention, your score in the app will never be what a lender pulls. So I just use it to monitor credit card usage and any collections. Other than that, the app is garbage. Edit to include CK's response: I already know that. I am informing others, because clearly your formula isn't accurate. And if it's not accurate... it's not useful.

title: Hitmasters
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming a spy? Start with simple puzzles and then advance to some challenging levels! Tons of weapons await you in the game arsenal. Try them all!

Make decisions wisely. One mistake and your enemies catch you! Don't leave them a chance. Or... just start over again.
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming a spy? Start with simple puzzles and then advance to some challenging levels! Tons of weapons await you in the game arsenal. Try them all!

Make decisions wisely. One mistake and your enemies catch you! Don't leave them a chance. Or... just start over again.
summary: Defeat the enemy with one blow. Epic puzzle adventure
developerAddress:
Maximos Michailidis 6
MAXIMOS PLAZA TOWER 3
3106 Limassol
Cyprus
support@playgendary.com
recentChanges:
We are ready to make your game experience even greater. Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy.

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: Whimsical! Although the graphics are somewhat mundane, the game is an overall barrel of laughs. A real two dimensional, kinda dark, side splitter. The main character, "The Hitmaster", joyfully executes all types of people, from commoners to law enforcement officers with a Looney Toones, throwback effect. So whether you're 8 or 80,you'll get a kick outta this game. I'd recommend it as a stress relief, or a way to entertain one's self and friends.

Fun mindless entertainment. However as with many other similar PlayStore games it is riddled with a disproportionate amount of ads. Time to uninstall. I appreciate that ads are required for resources and there are many other apps that manage ads well. However the ads should be secondary to the app experience not the other way around. The way it's designed it feels like gameplay is the interruption amid a stream of ads. Try playing the game yourself and read your other reviews that say the same.

Bombarded with ads but it's a mobile game. The game is visually pleasing and has a nice design. However there is no difficulty scaling whatsoever. Instead of the game getting harder with each level it just gets more creative in terms of how you're killing the badies. For example, I'm on level 55 and there's only one possible place I can shoot and I only need one bullet, there's a chain reaction and you win the round. This makes the game boring stale and repetitive. Good concept poor execution

Basically just a rigged slot machine, the puzzles are super easy, if you want to skip a level you have to watch an ad. On top of that their is an ad after every level. When you get the the "gun shop" you either have to watch an ad to get the "free" "gun" and it's always the wore gun, there are chance mechanics but they are rigged to give you the lowest prize automatically. I have been playing for months and never gotten any better than the worse prize. Money grab, that's it.

I've been playing for an hour nearly now, its a decent enough shooting puzzle game to waste some time on, though it gets repetitive, but I downloaded it because of the pipe puzzles which are shown in the store images. Havent seen any of these at all and it doesn't look like anyone else has either. The developers aren't addressing this issue in responses to reviews pointing this out either. Hint: turn WiFi and data off to stop constant interruption.

title: Tank Stars
description:
Tanks at your fingertips. Choose a weapon ‚Äì a simple missile to an atomic bomb ‚Äì and find the right shooting angle and destroy your opponents.
Make the right shot quickly or you‚Äôll die.

‚Äî Loads of deadly weapons: everything for perfect annihilation
‚Äî Online multiplayer game. Play with friends
‚Äî Cool weapon upgrades to make you really powerful and break-back
‚Äî Epic graphic effects

We Love You. Enjoy.

Tanks at your fingertips. Choose a weapon ‚Äì a simple missile to an atomic bomb ‚Äì and find the right shooting angle and destroy your opponents.
Make the right shot quickly or you‚Äôll die.

summary: Choose the right weapon and accurate angle to shoot and win the tank battle!
developerAddress: Landshuter Allee 8-10, 80637 Munich, Germany
recentChanges:
We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: It's a dorky 2 d game. But I love it. I play it with my kids. Also toooooooo many ads! I am annoyed to have to watch ads to earn coins to buy upgrades. There should be a way to earn enough through the game. What if I pay$ 3.99 for no ads? How will I earn coins and extra power in the tournaments? I hope the developers of this game get stomach cancer. You think that's harsh? Try literally wasting hours of your life watching all these ads.

Game is great. I have no problem at all with the actual game, HOWEVER, the thing that brought this game down from what could have been a four or five star, was the ads. The moment you open the game, there is no way you won't see an ad. Win a battle? Watch an ad. Loose a battle? Watch an ad. And yes I get that you can spend money to remove ads but a lot of players are freebees, and that really narrows down where you are getting revinue from. Please do something about the ads.

I like the game, but the ads make it unplayable. An ad after every two shots, often before and after every game, and randomly in the main page. Plus you have to watch an ad to actually receive any rewards from playing. I decided to purchase the overpriced ad removal to be able to actually enjoy the game. DO NOT DO THAT!! It does not actually remove all of the ads. You still have to watch an add after every single round just to receive any rewards. This game is not pay to win, its watch to win.

the game is a lot of fun although there is a warning right now there is a lot of ads on this game I would recommend playing with the signal off for such as Wi-Fiso if you don't want to get rid of the fads do not play with Wi-Fi on although it is still a very fun gametank stars is the best game I've ever played that is why I rated 5-stars I would rate it 10 Stars if there was a such thing

When I first played the game I was super happy! I loved the theme and the easy controls! I am not giving it 5 or 4 stars, though. First, sometimes when I got out of the game and then came back the game wouldn't work, and that's not all. The only way to play again correctly was to UNISTALL the game! WHAT THE HECK?! I lost all my progress more than THREE TIMES! Second, because I am not done, there are WAY TO MANY ADS! Every 1 to 2 minutes an ad appears! If it had less ads...

title: Google Translate
description:
‚Ä¢ Text translation: Translate between 103 languages by typing
‚Ä¢ Tap to Translate: Copy text in any app and tap the Google Translate icon to translate (all languages)
‚Ä¢ Offline: Translate with no internet connection (59 languages)
‚Ä¢ Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera (88 languages)
‚Ä¢ Photos: Take or import photos for higher quality translations (50 languages)
‚Ä¢ Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly (43 languages)
‚Ä¢ Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing (95 languages)
‚Ä¢ Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference (all languages)
‚Ä¢ Cross-device syncing: Login to sync phrasebook between app and desktop

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Korean, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Scots Gaelic, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

Permissions Notice

‚Ä¢ Camera for translating text via the camera
‚Ä¢ SMS for translating text messages
‚Ä¢ External storage for downloading offline translation data
‚Ä¢ Accounts and credentials for signing-in and syncing across devices

developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges: You can now continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time with the Translate app. For example, translate a classroom lecture or a speech. ‚Ä¢ The Tap-to-Translate floating icon is now movable and easily dismissable. You can also translate copied text by tapping on the notification itself.
comments: The best non intrusive translation app I've ever used thus far. Translated text, SMS, photos, and the new features as of Sept I1 is translating spoken languages. I'm very happy with the app. You can also click on an application and it will translate the app before you even get started using it. Now you tell me how great that is??? Exactly!!! person found this helpful Was this review helpful

This application needs a few adjustments to be a lot better, in my opinion. Translations being more accurate, more languages/more of them available offline, having more voice types where you can change the accents and gender, and a dark mode. It would also be great if the voices were fixed to be more understandable, but some languages do not have voice output whatsoever. One language which I can say does not support voice output is Zulu, which is also a language which cannot be used offline.

This application needs a few adjustments to be a lot better, in my opinion. Translations being more accurate, more languages/more of them available offline, having more voice types where you can change the accents and gender, and a dark mode. It would also be great if the voices were fixed to be more understandable, but some languages do not have voice output whatsoever. One language which I can say does not support voice output is Zulu, which is also a language which cannot be used offline.

Sometimes, this app works very well. It gives me perfect translations. But most of the time, when I try to translate kannada or hindi to english, it gives me only half the words I select. It doesn't even translate it correctly! Like, if I try to translate a poem or a paragraph, it will only give me a few words. And most of the words won't even be translated correctl, it remains the same!

I am using Google translate for more than 5 months and I find it very useful. It is very helpful for my studies also. I can find any translation in the app. Even I can translate my book pages by just showing it to the translate camera. The conversation feature is the best in the app. We can now speak to different people from different languages using that feature. I am very happy with the app. Thank you Googleüòäüòäüòä

title: TRANSFORMERS: Forged to Fight
description:
Calling all Autobots, Decepticons, Predacons and Maximals!

Join Optimus Prime, Megatron, Bumblebee, Waspinator, Rhinox, Grimlock, Soundwave and many more of your favorite bots in the battle for supremacy where Transformers universes collide. This exciting action-fighting RPG brings the heroic storytelling and spectacular action from over 30 years of Transformers history to your mobile device!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Collect iconic bots from the entire Transformers universe
‚Ä¢ Battle other players with devastating special attacks, ranged blasting, destructible terrain and huge 360¬∞ arenas
‚Ä¢ Team up with your friends, forge alliances and battle in global events
‚Ä¢ Set a gauntlet of bots and defenses to protect your base, get revenge on those that attack and raid enemy bases
‚Ä¢ Deploy away teams to score epic loot


Roll Out!

WiFi or cellular connection is required to play.
Optional in-app purchases available.

Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/forgedtofight
Follow us on Twitter: @ForgedtoFight 
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: youtube.com/TransformersForgedtoFight

summary: Join your favorite Bots in battle where Transformers universes collide!
developerAddress: 1118 Alberni Street, Suite 200, Vancouver, v6e1a5, Canada
recentChanges:
New Features
‚Ä¢ NEW BOT Necrotronus is coming!
‚Ä¢ Titan Fragments - Collect a brand new currency that gives you access to previously unavailable bots
‚Ä¢ Experience the thrilling conclusion to Act 4, Act 4 Chapter 4 and face off against the toughest challenge in story mode yet!
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue with the Thai language not displaying correctly
‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue with missing strings in multiple languages
‚Ä¢ Addressed incorrect Forge preview when Forging over level 100
comments: Lag, slow loading and high prices, this game lags so bad that sometimes I can't even chat, the timer should not run during loading in a raid. Sometimes it takes 3-4 minutes to load a fight and I lose my raid because it takes so long to load. Startup takes 7-8 minutes The shop items are expensive for what you get for your money. No bonus items really for spending more. Most games the more money you spend the more you get in bonuses. Not this game. If my husband didn't play I would quit.

The game as a whole is good even though there are countless hackers threatening to destroy it if their demands are not met but regardless the game as a hole is glorious as it stands and should not be tampered with under any circumstance unless it is by the developer and the only reason why it would ever be considered hard is because a bunch of morons ruined it by hacking.

My favorite game but I have 2 problems: 1) I bought a mobile with 90Hz display and the game doesn't support it. 2) Very often I get the error message "Problem connecting to network". Only the game didn't respond. The other apps like Chrome, Facebook etc which needs internet connection works flawlessly.

Most of the people playing this game say that it's slow. I can assure you that it isn't, their internet just must not be that great and playing the game on tablet or bluestacks is probably a better option than a tiny phone trying to render the game. The story is meh, but the game barely focuses on it. You also should care more about upgrading your characters because sooner or later you are going to be weak fighting insanely hard robots due to the game assuming you want to grind or jump and die.

I love this game, but the data consumption is much. I would like this game better if you add more characters like Bulkhead, Alpha Trion, Micronus Prime, and other primes, Steel Jaw, Strongarm, Fallen, Blurr, Polarclaw, Crasher, Octopunch, Crazybolt, Shadelock, Clawtrap, Glacius, Hammer, and other Minicons like Fixit, Jetstorm, Slipstream, Aerobolt, Ransack, etc. The game would be more interesting with more challenging modes. I hope you will read these suggestions I have made.

comments: Good game, good game, not alot of problems. First thing though, the ads...theres a bit many of them. Second problem, i don't know if i'd call this a problem or not but sometimes my penguin can bounce under the screen and it goes without him there. Its just a shadow...i made it to a million and i don't know what to do with this ._.

This game should be renamed "Admasters" lol. Ads after every single play and in between plays as well. Want more coins? Watch a video. Didn't want the extra coins? Here's a video anyway! Did good or bad? Here's a video. Want a free treasure chest or upgrade? Watch another video!!!! Don't want ads, pay up $$$ Fun game and funny characters ruined by horribly intrusive ads.

The game would be pretty awesome, but it's absolutely teeming with ads. You practically can't do anything with out having an ad shoved in your face. Want to know how ridiculous and greedy this app is? If you click to double your earnings after a turn, you get an ad; if you choose not to double your earnings (which is a grayed out option that is intentionally designed to look unclickable) you almost always STILL have to wait through an ad. The ads make this game unplayable.

I like the gameplay, but there is one thing that I don't like: the failure animation should your penguin travel too slowly after falling into a water hole. Your penguin is torn to shreds by a school of hungry piranha, with blood shown. I would request the developers to either change this scene to something more family friendly, or change the rating of the app from E to E10+ for mild blood.

I wanna give four stars as this is a nice game and the problems are more iritating.üò£ everything is nice but there is more ads which is annoying and most of the time my penguin goes under the earth..i dont know how it is happenning....i can view only the shadow of my penguin....this things occurs most of the time....more and more annoyed by thisüòê

title: Run Sausage Run!
description:
Run, Sausage, run!
Hot diggity dog, that‚Äôs a fine lookin‚Äô hot dog! 
You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such‚Ä¶ sausage? Anyone?)

Stop punning and start running! This adventure run is a hot dog‚Äôs dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.

Play as the tasty sausage of your choice. Weisswurst or blutwurst, bacon or chocolate‚Ä¶ even plumber or cowboy!

Run for your life through an endless path as you flex that hot-dog body and avoid getting sliced, chopped, burned or smashed in this adventure run game! 

Tons of juicy sausages to choose from, tons of hot dog skins to enjoy in this adventure run. 

Collect coins as you run for your sweet (or spicy) life to buy buns of steel and other cool powerups in this adventure run game.

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

title: All Skin Diseases and Treatment- A to Z
description:
Best comprehensive overview covers the symptoms and treatment of skin disease. This app has been developed for everyone, all topics has been made to make it complete, useful and interesting.

Learn about & view photos of common skin disorders ranging from allergic eczema to Virgilio to hives,their cause,precaution and treatment.
This application provides you the details about the skin disease for your references. so please read it carefully. 

Skin disorder will give you privilege to read skin related articles from skin experts into the app and app will notify about skin care tips time to time. It's a perfect app to prevent and improve skin daily.

Gross out your friends or research a particular disease using this offline medical reference app.
The images might be pretty stomach wrenching, but this app could help you, your friends or family to be diagnosed early. We have the most common skin problems and the goriest ones too.

title: Flip Diving
description:
‚Ä¢ The World's #1 cliff diving game - now on your mobile! ‚Ä¢

Pull off Frontflips, Backflips & Gainers from high cliffs, rickety platforms, trees, castles, and trampolines! Choose from a wide range of divers, and unlock new tricks and moves. Aim for a perfect entry into the water, and don‚Äôt hit the rocks!

Featuring a custom physics engine with animated ragdoll physics, Flip Diving is the most dynamic and entertaining cliff diving experience ever created!

TONS OF DIVING TRICKS
‚Ä¢ Layouts, Pikes, Reverses - and more tricks coming soon! 
‚Ä¢ Each trick dynamically animated with ragdoll physics!

DEATH-DEFYING LOCATIONS
‚Ä¢ Dive from trees, boats, trampolines and more!
‚Ä¢ Over 50 jump platforms to leap from!

A HUGE RANGE OF CHARACTERS 
‚Ä¢ Take a dive as a bodybuilder, a businessman, or in a penguin costume!
‚Ä¢ Each diver has different abilities, weights, and unique physics!
‚Ä¢ More coming soon! 

SHOW OFF TO YOUR FRIENDS
‚Ä¢ Record your best dives - or your biggest fails - and share them with your friends!

----------------------------------------

Photos/Media/Files access requested in order to save and share your replays.
This game does not require internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: Really fun and really good. Fair graphics and I don't mind the ads. I'm never able to get addicted to a game on my phone though. Hey game devs keep the ads in because I know you all need money and that's kinda the point of games. And have you guys gotten any follow ups from the one start reviews?

This game is so cool!! I love it, also it's free and the amount of space to download it is just right. This game isn't a waste of time. Sometimes I download games/apps and it doesn't work. But this game, I DON'T have that problem. So thanks a lot for making this game.
Fun game. I'm only rating 4 stars because it starts to get a bit repetitive just jumping off the same cliff. Try adding obstacles and even compete against other players and this game will be great.
Ok this is a very fun, good exciting game and love it. The only thing I don't like is what the ads are for what is the point of putting ads? That's my only downside to this game but I enjoy it
Its a fun game. I'm fine with ads because that's how devs make money. Also this game is like my childhood.

title: Gacha Life
description:
‚òÖ Welcome to Gacha Life ‚òÖ
Are you ready to start a new adventure? Create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! Choose from hundreds of dresses, shirts, hairstyles, weapons, and much more! After designing your characters, enter the Studio and create any scene you can imagine!¬†Choose from over a hundred backgrounds to create the perfect story! 

Enter the new Life mode to explore different areas and meet new friends along the way! Chat with NPCs and learn more about them, they might even give you a surprise! Play your favorite mini-games and collect gems to Gacha for rare gifts to add to your collection! The possibilities are endless! What are you waiting for? Jump into Gacha Life and begin your journey today!

CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTERS
‚òÖ Dress up your characters with the latest anime fashion! Mix and match hundreds of clothes, weapons, hats, and more! Now with 20 Character Slots!
‚òÖ Customize your personal look! Change your hairstyle, eyes, mouth, and more!
‚òÖ New items, poses, and more that were never seen before in Gacha Studio and Gachaverse!

STUDIO MODE
‚òÖ Create your own scenes in Studio Mode! Enter custom text for your characters and choose from many different poses and backgrounds!
‚òÖ Make your own stories in the Skit Maker! Easily combine multiple scenes to create sketches!

LIFE MODE
‚òÖ Explore different areas with your own characters such as the town, school, and more!
‚òÖ Discover new NPCs and chat with them to learn more about their lives!
‚òÖ Play offline! No Wi-Fi is needed to play!

GACHA GAMES
‚òÖ Choose from 8 different mini-games such as Duck & Dodge or Phantom‚Äôs Remix!
‚òÖ Collect and Gacha over 100 Gifts to add to your collection! 
‚òÖ Free 2 Play, you can farm for Gems easily!

¬´Notes¬ª

Thank you for playing Gacha Life!!!

title: Flip Master
description:
The ULTIMATE TRAMPOLINE GAME on Mobile!

Master the trampoline with Frontflips, Backflips, Gainers, Layouts, Jumps and Bounces on your backyard, gym or circus trampolines and train to be the Master of Trampoline!

With a custom physics engine and animated Ragdoll Physics, Flip Master is the most dynamic and entertaining Trampoline experience ever created! Defy the laws of physics and prove yourself worthy!


Download Flip Master NOW and get:
--------------------------------------

VARIETY OF COOL LOCATIONS!

Pick your location! A Backyard, Gym, a Competitive trampoline, Crazy Circus and Trampoline Park with multiple trampolines!

SKILLS AND TRICKS TO UNLOCK! 

Unlock dangerous and spectacular skills! Backflips, Frontflips, Gainers and 10 more tricks at the palm of your hand!

CRAZY POWER UPS!

Power-up Frenzy! A huge amount of power-ups to choose from! Select the medicine ball or the Foam Cube and get the jumping party started! Even More - go to a gold rush with the Coin Rain power-up and much more!

AMAZING CHARACTERS!

Choose, upgrade and customize your characters. Jump as an athlete and reach amazing heights! Every character has their own unique physics!

SHOW OFF YOUR BEST MOVES TO YOUR FRIENDS!

Record your best moves and funniest falls! Show the World who dominates the Trampoline!

--------------------------------------

title: Drive Ahead!
description:
It's a gladiator car fight!

Get points by smacking friends in the head with a car. Battle with off-road vehicles, garbage trucks, tanks and rally cars. Collect cars, coins, bolts and helmets to advance in increasingly dangerous battle arenas. Can you beat a monster truck with a BMX bike? Time to grab the wheel and find out!

Play Drive Ahead! in multiple game modes:

- The Battle Arena opens up permanently and becomes THE place were undisputed champions are made!
- Challenge friends in quick-fire multiplayer fights or intense co-op challenges!
- Enter the Rift Riders universe to unlock powerful and exclusive rides!
- Explore exotic Mission Stadiums for amazing rewards, while avoiding hazards like robots and aliens!!
- How long can you reign in King of the Hill before you go kaboom?

Hundreds of pixel cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing two-player racing action with freak accidents! Just be careful not to wreck yourself!

----------------------------------------------
MORE ABOUT THE DEVELOPER

Dodreams Ltd. is also the creator of the multiplayer hit game Drive Ahead! Sports. We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf. 

Are you enjoying Drive Ahead? Help us make more fun games like this by rating and reviewing it!

title: LEGO¬Æ Legacy: Heroes Unboxed
description:
Your favorite minifigures and sets are busting out of the box in the most vibrant turn-based RPG ever assembled.

Battle your way to the top of the leaderboard with teams of iconic heroes from the LEGO themes you love and prepare for action-packed RPG campaigns that will take you all the way from the high seas to space.

[STRATEGIC RPG BATTLES]
Create the LEGO mashup of your dreams! Utilize each hero for their unique skills to battle and dismantle your RPG foes. Take your team to the next level with a winning turn-based strategy.

[COLLECT ICONIC HEROES]
Unite iconic LEGO minifigures from all eras such as Hot Dog Man, Captain Redbeard, Lloyd from Ninjago, Majisto, Willa the Witch, the classic Red Spaceman and many more! Power up your heroes to build awesome abilities and strike down your enemies!

[BUILD REAL LEGO SETS]
Rediscover amazing sets from every LEGO theme including: LEGO City, LEGO Castle, LEGO Ninjago, LEGO Pirate and LEGO Space (with many more to come!). Build sets and unravel their secrets to add strength and create synergies to help your teams in battle.

[MULTIPLAYER TURN-BASED STRATEGY RPG]
Join forces with other RPG players in asynchronous multiplayer battles! Join a guild and borrow heroes to help you battle your way through campaigns and events.

[NEW LEGO ADVENTURES]
Strike out into a completely new RPG LEGO world on a journey of thrills, chills, humor... and peril!

To ensure that as many LEGO fans as possible can enjoy this RPG adventure, the game is designed to be cross-platform, meaning that players are able to save, resume and battle against their friends regardless of the device they play on.

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite minifigures and sets are busting out of the box in the most vibrant turn-based RPG ever assembled.

Battle your way to the top of the leaderboard with teams of iconic heroes from the LEGO themes you love and prepare for action-packed RPG campaigns that will take you all the way from the high seas to space.

[STRATEGIC RPG BATTLES]
Create the LEGO mashup of your dreams! Utilize each hero for their unique skills to battle and dismantle your RPG foes. Take your team to the next level with a winning turn-based strategy.

[COLLECT ICONIC HEROES]
Unite iconic LEGO minifigures from all eras such as Hot Dog Man, Captain Redbeard, Lloyd from Ninjago, Majisto, Willa the Witch, the classic Red Spaceman and many more! Power up your heroes to build awesome abilities and strike down your enemies!

[BUILD REAL LEGO SETS]
Rediscover amazing sets from every LEGO theme including: LEGO City, LEGO Castle, LEGO Ninjago, LEGO Pirate and LEGO Space (with many more to come!). Build sets and unravel their secrets to add strength and create synergies to help your teams in battle.

[MULTIPLAYER TURN-BASED STRATEGY RPG]
Join forces with other RPG players in asynchronous multiplayer battles! Join a guild and borrow heroes to help you battle your way through campaigns and events.

recentChanges:
Our Halloween update is upon us and have we got a ghoulishly good time in store!
A new Master event featuring the spookiest guy around... or should we say booo-iest?
Then after Halloween, when the world is full of frights, the updated Ghostbusters events will return to clean up Piptown.
comments: I downloaded this game at the first ad I saw for it because I'm a huge Lego fan. I can safely say I haven't been disappointed. It's got plenty of content to keep you entertained and all the E rated humor you expect out of a Lego title. The roster keeps expanding and the devs clearly care about the community. If you like legos, this will definitely be your type of game.

So far it's pretty awesome! The actual licensed soundtrack is great!! Plays like other collection turn based strategy games, so easy to pick up if you have played others of this style. Fun dialogue, as always from the comedy of the Lego team! Definitely worth checking out! Be aware, these are definitely aimed at getting you to spend $, so you will progress annoying slow after you hit the end of what they consider the "Free to play" portion, around level 25.

It's awesome to see lego figurines having personalities. Nice, cute and funny store. Cool gameplay mechanics, but that's all to it. Like every other mobile game, this one with no exception has heavy monetization. And I mean huge! Some items are more expensive than their counterparts in real life. P2W/P2P mechanics, season passes and outrageous macro transactions. Shame on you lego. Even for a fan like me who spent more than $10k on lego sets, thinks prices in this game are ridiculous.

Another update, less fun. Pay for new figures, pay for new sets: it's all about the $$$. Disgusting. The graphics, music, sounds and dialog are fantastic but even after a couple of months of playing it's horrible. Totally unfair and unbalanced gameplay. Updates provide more paid content and bugs, no balancing or fixes. Store is insanely overpriced and very low value. Membership is only for two weeks instead of a month. Shameless LEGO cash grab, stay away.

Unfortunately a majority of mo(MMASBOY)bile gamers still isnt able, to notice, how botted & rigged, endless-collections are! If you played other collection games, you have seen highly inbalanced, inequal & unfair concepts like this already. It is blamable that LEGO damages its reputation by licencing a mass-product game with such childish wannabe-competition! Mobile designers are incapable to provide balanced, equal & fair conditions, so why always spoil games with awkward contests & events?!?

title: Telehealth - Talk to all types of doctors 24/7
description:
THE DR ONLINE WILL SEE YOU NOW‚Ä¶	
The Telehealth app immediately assigns a licensed online doctor ‚Äì 
To answer your medical questions of all types!

1.	State-Certified online doctor visit to the digital platform of your choice!
2.	Get hold of the top medical physicians in the world!
3.	Simple three stage signup ‚Äì register for trial, login, start online doctor chat!
4.	Smart doctor app match - Get transferred to the right online medicine expert!

From everyday medial issues to specialized cases, you can talk to a doctor online when requested and receive 24 hour doctor first opinion on your medical concerns -

Psychiatry - chat with a doctor about various troubling mental issues
Pulmonology - discuss lung conditions and breathing disorders
Gastroenterology - call a doctor to find out about stomach, liver or colon conditions including procedures such as endoscopy and colonoscopy
Endocrinology - Consult with a doctor on anything to do with the hormonal system, including hormone imbalances, gland conditions and children‚Äôs growth problems
Gynecology - ask your web doctor about pregnancy, breast care, female reproductive health, infertility and more
Infectious disease - instantly Talk to a doctor if you‚Äôre showing symptoms of influenza, bacterial infections, parasite infections, tuberculosis etc.
Dermatology - Online chat with a doctor on call on the topics of acne, eczema, nails, hair and of other conditions of the skin
Cardiology - conduct a doctor video conversation to get treatment for high blood pressure, high cholesterol, heart rhythm problems and congestive heart failure

HAVE THE BEST DOCTOR ONLINE PAY YOU A DOCTOR VISIT FREE
The Telehealth app offers you a 7 day trial starting at only $1!

In this time period you‚Äôll be able to ask a doctor free medical questions, consult with various doctors and even get an online doctor visit free to your complete satisfaction.

You may opt to try our service before committing to it, in which case you‚Äôll be asked to deposit a payment of $5 for a one-time question.

However, the best thing about joining the Telehealth app service is the low monthly membership fee for only $19! This allows you to consult an unlimited number of experts from all types of medical fields.

HAVE A FACE TO FACE TALK WITH THE DOC
Our video talk add-on makes the virtual doctor come alive when you find yourself face to face casually talking to your doctor as if you were actually there, or rather, he or she was actually where you are. Whether you‚Äôre home, at work or in your car you can have your doctor come over for a quick checkup.

CALL DOCTOR WITH THE DOCTOR CALL OPTION
We also enable users to keep the visits going on a continuous phone conversation. 
Many of our experts are available beyond the chat, to provide a more personal care for our registered users. This allows them to let go of their uncertainties as they listen to the calming voice of the physician they come to trust and whose opinion they respect.

So just sign up, and the doctor will see you right away‚Ä¶

Install the Telehealth app and get licensed doctors of all types to answer all your medical questions!

title: Draw a Stickman: EPIC 2
description:
** Winner of 5 Webby Awards - Draw a Stickman Franchise **
** Played over 100 Million Times around the Globe **


Grab your pencil and get ready for the most creative DRAW A STICKMAN adventure yet, with the first 2 levels FREE! 


Imagination is the key, as you enter a magical storybook land full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures and enigmatic puzzles!  Create your own original stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2!  Challenge yourself to unlock every secret, collect every drawing and share your creativity with the world!


BRING YOUR DRAWINGS TO LIFE!

Unleash your creativity as you draw a Stickman from your own unique perspective, and then watch your animated Hero come to life before your eyes!  Make every idea a reality by saving unlimited drawings in your Sketchbook, and sharing them with friends!


A NEW STORY

Embark on a perilous journey through time!  Draw your Stickman and create a friend!  But be warned‚Ä¶.disaster falls upon your ally!  It‚Äôs up to you to become the hero! Maneuver your way through the magical world of EPIC 2 in a quest to save your partner!


YOUR DRAWINGS MATTER

Create and save unlimited drawings in your sketchbook!  Use them throughout your adventure!


SHARE AND RECEIVE DRAWINGS WITH FRIENDS

With the new share feature, you can now send your creations to your friends!  They will then be able to use your drawings in their own epic adventures!  


FIGHT EPIC BATTLES

Face off against inked-out goblins, tongue-lashing frogs, fire-breathing dragons, and BIG bosses!  You must use your own strategies to solve intriguing challenges and puzzles, while battling all new villains!


Jump in to this action-packed adventure that allows for endless creativity! 


As you explore each colorful environment, choose from an assortment of drawing pencils and tools to help you successfully overcome every obstacle along the way.


New features and enhancements allow you to choose from a larger color palette, along with a variety of pencil sizes.  With the new share feature, send your drawings to your friends!  Unlock hidden Color Buddies, locate puzzle pieces, and enjoy new drawing pencils for Wires, Eggs, and Ice! This is an experience like no other, personalized by you!


DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2 is the sequel you‚Äôve been waiting for and is sure to offer hours of entertainment to avid gamers and creative minds alike!

title: ACDS CAMP
description:
CAMP (contact allergy management program) is a database provided by the American Contact Dermatitis Society (ACDS) which is designed to help patients with allergic contact dermatitis find personal care products that are free of the ingredients that are causing their allergic reactions. Each list generated is personalized for the patient. The list is not exhaustive, but is an excellent starting point for patients to find products that will relieve their allergic reactions.

The CAMP app is designed to allow patients to carry their own personalized list of up to 5000 "safe" products on their phone in an easy-to-use and sort format. The CAMP app makes shopping for allergen-free products simple!

In order to use the CAMP app, patients must first obtain their individualized "safe" product list and user ID codes from a participating ACDS physician.

The CAMP app is designed to access the CAMP database so that the patient‚Äôs safe product list is displayed on their phone. The list can then be sorted by product type, brand name or product name. There is also a search function to help search for products using specific criteria. Favorite products can be chosen and displayed. The app also displays a list of specific allergens which the patient needs to avoid.

comments: So far I haven't found any products that match. I think the app creators might want to add functionality to allow one to scan a bar code (UPC code) to see if that product is safe. On failed matches they could add it to a database of products needing verification.

This would be great but somehow the code has an error. In the display of compatible products the brands are omitted and only the semicolon and the rest of the product name displays. This makes it a guessing game as to which product line has the item. great idea. needs fixed

Great idea and I love having this so readily when I go to the store. Needs an update! New products have hit the market and ingredients may have changed. I wish there was more information when you clicked on a product, like a list of ingredients, or a photo of the product, or an url to the manufacturer's website.
Horrible! Everything on the safe list ended up having my allergen. Why even bother?? Also no one to contact. Search SUCKS. Not worth the amount paid for this app (it was free)
Products available are not updated! 3 years behind. Wish it would get updated.

title: Slap Kings
description:
Slap or be slapped: that‚Äôs the name of the game! This amusing and relaxing game will test your strength and timing skills so your smack generates the most power! Your hits will pack a punch. Watch your opponents fly out of the ring when you hit the knockout blow. How far do you think you can get in this face slapping good time tournament? Can you unlock your special power‚Ä¶ the Golden Fire Fist?

Easy to learn but surprising depth will provide you with hours of entertainment. Fun characters are just asking to get slapped in the face.

Time to knockout the competition and show them who the true Slap King is!


 
 Game Features:
1.       Simple but addicting mechanics
The meter will go back and forth - time it right for maximum power!

2.       Fun Characters
So many amusing characters challenging you to see who is the best slapper out there

3.       Power boosts
Stuck on a boss? Power up with limited time boosts! Defense helmets to withstand the hardest blows and your ultimate weapon...

4.        Chill and have fun
Nice casual, relaxing, smacking good fun. Show them who is the king.

Whether you want to smack, hit, slap, or fight, this game is for you. Slap Kings is the true slapping champion game.


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

descriptionHTML:
Slap or be slapped: that‚Äôs the name of the game! This amusing and relaxing game will test your strength and timing skills so your smack generates the most power! Your hits will pack a punch. Watch your opponents fly out of the ring when you hit the knockout blow. How far do you think you can get in this face slapping good time tournament? Can you unlock your special power‚Ä¶ the Golden Fire Fist?

Easy to learn but surprising depth will provide you with hours of entertainment. Fun characters are just asking to get slapped in the face.

Time to knockout the competition and show them who the true Slap King is!



Game Features:
1. Simple but addicting mechanics
The meter will go back and forth - time it right for maximum power!

2. Fun Characters
So many amusing characters challenging you to see who is the best slapper out there

3. Power boosts
Stuck on a boss? Power up with limited time boosts! Defense helmets to withstand the hardest blows and your ultimate weapon...

4. Chill and have fun
Nice casual, relaxing, smacking good fun. Show them who is the king.

Whether you want to smack, hit, slap, or fight, this game is for you. Slap Kings is the true slapping champion game.


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

developerAddress:
1100 Page Mill Road

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes.
comments: The game is nice and clean but only till level 65-70. After that game become too tuff for you to control, there should be a way to control things. Imagine the game level after 100. On top of it, too many unnecessary ads making the game not that awesome.. But that's what you get for playing free these days. No option to exit from the game, you have to end the task to get out from it. Hope developer will work in games longevity and UI.

Awesome, fun little game to pass some time, when needed. There are some ads, but if you are ALSO playing this game to kill some time, then who cares? Everybody's gotta make some $$ somehow. The real bonus here is, if you have to close the game immediately, it's no big deal. (As opposed to other games where it affects certain things if you have to suddenly quit)

Hey guys, want a game where you play for ten seconds and then have the option to watch 2 1/2 minutes of ads everytime? Then this is the game for you! For real though, game is trash, just an ad dump. Horrible, horrible product from something they could have actually been fun.

Even after paying to remove ads, you're still seeing ads all the time. Any other game like this when you pay to remove ads they are completely removed. With this one it just removes a few. You're still slapped with ads if you want the multiplier, if you want to use the super slap, and if you want to claim the skin and super slap you just unlocked. Not worth your time or money.

Loads of sick fun. The graphics are crude but I probably wouldn't want them realistic. No complaints about the controls, and the motions of the avatars twirling, getting dizzy, beat up looking, even your own, are nice to help keep it real. Reminds me of punch contests in Jr. High, trying out new muscle. Take turns shocking each other in the bicep, showing off how much you could take as well as give.

title: Episode - Choose Your Story
description:
Our newest update gets you to the good stuff 2x faster!
We‚Äôre talking faster load times, smoother animations and juicier stories.
 
Episode lets you LIVE your stories through love, romance, adventure, and drama. Wouldn‚Äôt it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 100,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter.

With billions of reads, Episode is the world‚Äôs largest collection of interactive stories where YOU choose your destiny. Or become a creator and write your own!

How does it work?
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and design your outfits
‚Ä¢ Develop relationships with your favorite characters - will they be rivals or lovers?
‚Ä¢ Change your fate through your choices
‚Ä¢ Discover all of the different endings
‚Ä¢ Immerse yourself in thousands of diverse worlds, the options are endless!

Not only can you read your favorite stories, you can also write your own! Write and publish your very own interactive stories on Episode‚Äôs platform, amassing millions of reads yourself.

Some of our favorites reads:

LOVE ON FIRE: You‚Äôve been selected to join the ultimate dating competition. You‚Äôll live in a luxury beach-front mansion with other hot singles and look for your true love! 
 
RULE BREAKER: Find out what happens when you start crushing on someone who's technically "off limits." Will you pursue that romantic spark?
 
THE K*SS LIST is here! Kentwood Academy is ripe for taking over. Continue your perfect streak of ruling schools by kissing 10 of Kentwood's hottest singles.
 
IT‚ÄôLL BE OUR SECRET: Fighting infertility becomes easier when you and your super cute neighbor start a secret affair. The drama that comes with it...not so easy!
 
I MARRIED A MILLIONAIRE: Do opposites attract? You‚Äôve never believed in love... but when you marry a sexy millionaire, you begin to think otherwise.

FRIENDS WITH BENEFITS: Things between you and your BFF are suddenly...changing. Everyone says you can't cross that line, but what if the love is real?

Other goodies include:
‚Ä¢ Pretty Little Liars
‚Ä¢ Mean Girls: Senior Year
‚Ä¢ Clueless: School‚Äôs Out
‚Ä¢ Demi Lovato: Path to Fame
‚Ä¢ Falling for the Dolan Twins

PLUS‚Ä¶more new stories EVERY WEEK!

PRETTY LITTLE LIARS and all related characters and elements ¬© & ‚Ñ¢ Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. (s18)
TM & ¬©2018 Paramount Pictures. All Rights Reserved.

PLEASE NOTE: Episode lets you purchase items within the game for real money. Please disable in-app purchases on your device if you do not want this feature to be accessible.

developerAddress: 220 Montgomery Street, Suite 750 San Francisco, CA 94104
contentRatingDescription: Violence, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Language
recentChanges:
Check out our latest story: THE BILLIONAIRE BACHELORS
You're a contestant of a STEAMY new reality show starring 7 broke girls and 7 BILLIONAIRES. Once you get to the mansion, will you find love, or just fortune?

Coming Soon: I Never Got Over You
A well-heeled girl and a tattoo artist boy. On paper, you and Hardin Taylor are as incompatible as they come ‚Äì yet you find yourselves unable to forget your one night in NYC.
comments: its okay, but you need so many gems to get the stuff and like you got to wait THREE HOURS, to get only TWO ticket things to play again. Also when you finish a thing it only gives you ONE gem. Overall its a good app/game but it's just not as fun when you have to wait 3 hours, and then save your gems because some people don't have or don't want to spend money on a app/game for gems and a good story thing. Then to get all stories is 17 gems, which isn't bad at all, I get why it's 17.

I like how many stories there are and that you can choose where the path takes you but I do not like that all the more well thought out stories have so many choices that are gems. Either you spend your money or choose the option that is so bad. There are stories that have no gem options but I feel like most of those dont even have as many things you can choose. Overall I will give this a three star mainly because of the gem/giving money.

I enjoy reading the stories on episode. I don't have a major problem with gems, however it would be better if we started with a certain amount of gems. Also, I'm not sure, but I don't think you can see the rewards, e.g. after you read 50 episodes and you get 4 tickets every 3 hours. It would be more motivating if you could see how many episodes you have to read to unlock certain things.

Love this app and all the amazing storys. However, it becomes very frustrating when you want to pick an option but you have to pay for it with gems, no only this but I think it is ridiculous that you have to wait hours to get 4 passes, you should change it so you get one pass every couple of minutes (once you use a pass a 30 minute timer counts down to give you another one) as once you are very engrossed in a story you have to wait a while to continue on with it. But the app is great.

It's actually a fun game. But... Why we can't replay the only episode like episode 5 but need to replay from episode 1. Sometimes we might make some mistake, but we need to replay all the game again. Overall its actually fine. But sometimes I watch finish an ad to get the deducted of 30 minutes from waiting the pass, it told me that it have no add available now. So I just waste my times and get a not available??

title: Kick the Buddy
description:
Kick buddy arrives on Google Play

Explode, destroy, fire, shoot, smash, freeze, toss, send the power of the Gods and don't even think about stopping. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal to beat: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, and even a nuclear bomb!

We present to you Kick the Buddy ‚Äî it‚Äôs more than just a relaxing game it‚Äôs more than stress game. It‚Äôs a top interactive action game. Among all stress relief games, Kick Buddy is a relaxing game where you can slap the doll and forget about your anger. It's a fun game to play when bored.

Do you want to beat the boss, or maybe slap and bash the ragdoll?
Want to smash all around you in this destroying game?
Want more kicks?

Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to chill out at some point in stress games like ours.
